data.eml:eml: Mammal collection, Natural History Museum, University of Oslo

The Mammal collection of the NHMO DNA Bank holds a combination of tissue samples collected from dry vouchers in the traditional mammal collection at NHMO and from fresh specimens in the wild.

Samples in the NHMO DNA Bank are available for loans to the general scientific community, on the conditions set out in the Grant policy (see DNA Bank web page http://www.nhm.uio.no/english/research/infrastructure/dna-bank/). However, juridical or other limitations may apply to samples, which will have to be clarified before such samples can be loaned.
